General.Name: Ersan Alisveris Hizmetleri & Gida Sanayi Ticaret AS
General.Description: Ersan Alisveris Hizmetleri ve Gida Sanayi Ticaret A.S. operates a chain of supermarkets and hypermarkets in Turkey. It also offers products online. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
